posts.id: “𝙁𝙞𝙣𝙖𝙣𝙘𝙞𝙖𝙡 𝙛𝙧𝙚𝙚𝙙𝙤𝙢 𝙞𝙨𝙣’𝙩 𝙟𝙪𝙨𝙩 𝙖𝙗𝙤𝙪𝙩 𝙬𝙚𝙖𝙡𝙩𝙝, 𝙞𝙩’𝙨 𝙖_52
posts.text: “𝙁𝙞𝙣𝙖𝙣𝙘𝙞𝙖𝙡 𝙛𝙧𝙚𝙚𝙙𝙤𝙢 𝙞𝙨𝙣’𝙩 𝙟𝙪𝙨𝙩 𝙖𝙗𝙤𝙪𝙩 𝙬𝙚𝙖𝙡𝙩𝙝, 𝙞𝙩’𝙨 𝙖𝙗𝙤𝙪𝙩 𝙘𝙝𝙤𝙞𝙘𝙚𝙨.” In the latest episode of Life Unscripted, our Chief Business Officer – Life Insurance, Vivek Jain, shares how life insurance is evolving beyond protection to become a key driver of financial independence. In conversation with Pranjal Kamra and Srinivas Balasubramanian (ICICI Prudential Life Insurance Company Limited), Vivek highlights India’s shifting saving habits, growing appetite for risk, and the rise of digital-first investment and insurance portfolios. He explains why life insurance today is much more than a safety net, it’s a powerful tool for long-term wealth creation and a pathway to true financial freedom. Watch the full episode here: https://lnkd.in/gEt6AUKV hashtag #FinancialFreedom hashtag #LifeUnscripted hashtag #Policybazaar hashtag #LifeInsurance hashtag #InvestSmart
